about_the_game:
The official soundtrack from Son of Nor, the epic adventure game from stillalive Studios. Featuring original instrumental music composed and arranged by Mike Skalandunas, this content contains all 22 tracks recorded for the game in MP3 format.

The official Son of Nor soundtrack contains the following tracks:

1. Canyon Fray
2. The Edge
3. A Relic of the Past
4. Secrets of the Wind
5. Outskirts of the Inferno
6. Clashes with the Sarahul
7. The Forge
8. Lost in the Depths
9. Dawn
10. After the Collapse
11. Yant’shaza
12. Contention
13. Essence Temple
14. Unriddling Ancient Secrets
15. Drums of War
16. The Ruined City of Quil
17. Laangh
18. Sho’rak
19. Son of Nor
20. Reflection
21. Exploration
22. Tranquil

  • Processor: Intel® Core® 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ x2 6400+ or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia® 8800 GT / AMD® 4670 or faster with 1 GB VRAM (not compatible with all mobile/laptop video chipsets)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Ubuntu compatible sound card or chipset
